about_the_game:
Fight off AI drone attacks, explore the mine and extract resources, develop your base and plan your defense. Protect your mine

The demo version has a limited number of buildings to build and enemies, there is no global progression
detailed_description:
Fight off AI drone attacks, explore the mine and extract resources, develop your base and plan your defense. Protect your mine

The demo version has a limited number of buildings to build and enemies, there is no global progression
name: Mine Defender Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 1060
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Fight off AI drone attacks, explore the mine and extract resources, develop your base and plan your defense. Protect your mine
